name: Chibi Apes
description: CHIBI is ERC-20 tokenized Chibi Apes that are randomly generated 3D characters aping around the Ethereum blockchain as ERC-721 tokens and hosted on IPFS. It is home to futuristic, moody, and cool 3D characters. We live in a culture of collaboration and community. As we grow, we want to grow our community members, which are made up of creatives, technicians, and NFT enthusiasts. We are planning to release new collections, full integration with games and metaverses (Decentraland, Sandbox) and even physical collectibles! There will be future incentives tied to owning across generations. We will be implementing smart technology and leveraging other tools to build a unified community.
